title: Sammael's Wings
description: The Archdemon Baal has plans to rule creation, but to succeed he needs the wings of an Archangel. There are only two remaining candidates, and neither Jonathan nor his great aunt Sammael are going to give up their wings without a fight.In order to find his parents and stop Baal, Jonathan must travel to both Heaven and Hell. What he finds there will change him forever, but he knows that he is not alone. Heaven may fall, Hell may rise, but Jonathan will not rest until his family is safe once again in Hobbes End.And then there’s Lucifer to contend with. It’s going to be a busy week.
author: Hilton Pashley
